doc.field: New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
Subseries D. Building Up Infrastructure Levels for Dance (BUILD)
Subseries D. Building Up Infrastructure Levels for Dance (BUILD)

This subseries consists of materials created and collected by NYFA documenting the organization's program to provide resources for dance companies to achieve their artistic missions. Materials include individual organization applications consisting of organization information, applications, sponsorship agreements, proposed project descriptions, past project descriptions, press releases, promotional materials, correspondence between NYFA and the organizations, organizational or individual biographies, and resumes, as well as tax and financial information for each sponsored organization. The subseries also includes evaluations from panelists for each organization (in separate folders in the back of the boxes) and a folder of rejection letters to organizations who were not sponsored during those years.
This NYFA Program sponsored dance related organizations throughout the City of New York by giving them financial support to fund dance projects.
